data.name: ReadAccrualInstructions
data.value: select T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.OTY_ID, T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID, T1.AS_OF_DT, T1.DISCONTINUE_DT, T1.LAST_ACCRUAL_DT from CKT_ACCRUAL_INSTR T1 with(readuncommitted) where exists ( select * from CKT_OB_TRN T2 with(readuncommitted) where T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE and T2.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_ID and T2.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID and T2.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE and T2.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER and T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID and @otyType = T2.OTY_TYPE and @obgGeneratedId = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID and @cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER and @cpaType = T2.CPA_TYPE and @cspSupNumber = T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER and T2.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE' and T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE = 'S' )

data.name: ReadCaseCaseAssignment
data.value: select T1.NUMB, T1.NO_JURISDICTION_CD, T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T2.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T2.SPD_ID, T2.OFF_ID, T2.OSP_CODE, T2.OSP_DATE from CKT_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_ASSIGN_CASE T2 with(readuncommitted) on T1.NUMB = @numb and T1.NO_JURISDICTION_CD = ' ' and T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NO and T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate and T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate order by T1.NUMB

data.name: ReadCaseRoleCsePersonCaseRoleCsePerson
data.value: select T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.TYPE, T1.CASE_ROLE_ID, T1.START_DATE, T1.END_DATE, T1.EMANCIPATION_DT, T3.CAS_NUMBER, T3.CSP_NUMBER, T3.TYPE, T3.CASE_ROLE_ID, T3.START_DATE, T3.END_DATE, T3.EMANCIPATION_DT from CKT_CASE_ROLE T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) on @casNumber = T1.CAS_NUMBER and T1.TYPE = 'AP' and @casNumber = T3.CAS_NUMBER and T3.TYPE = 'CH' and T1.START_DATE <= T3.END_DATE and T1.END_DATE >= T3.START_DATE

data.name: ReadDebtDebtDetail
data.value: select T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OB_TRN_ID, T1.OB_TRN_TYP, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T1.OTY_TYPE, T2.DUE_DT, T2.BAL_DUE_AMT, T2.RETIRED_DT, T2.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T2.PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD, T2.CREATED_TMST from CKT_OB_TRN T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_DEBT_DTL T2 with(readuncommitted) on T1.OTY_TYPE = T2.OTY_TYPE and T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID and T1.OB_TRN_TYP = T2.OTR_TYPE and T1.OB_TRN_ID = T2.OTR_GENERATED_ID and T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE and T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.CREATED_TMST <= @createdTmst and @cspSupNumber = T1.CSP_SUP_NUMBER and @otyType = T1.OTY_TYPE and @obgGeneratedId = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID and @cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER and @cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE and T1.CREATED_TMST <= @createdTmst and T1.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE' and T1.CPA_SUP_TYPE = 'S'

data.name: ReadLegalActionDetailLegalAction
data.value: select T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.LA_DETAIL_NO, T1.END_DT, T1.EFFECTIVE_DT, T1.CREATED_TSTAMP, T1.NON_FIN_OBLG_TYPE, T1.DETAIL_TYPE, T2.CLASSIFICATION, T2.FILED_DT, T2.STANDARD_NO, T2.CREATED_TSTAMP from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEGAL_ACT_DTL T1 with(readuncommitted) on T2.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER and (T2.CLASSIFICATION in ('J', 'O')) and T2.FILED_DT > @filedDt and T2.CREATED_TSTAMP <= @createdTstamp and T1.CREATED_TSTAMP <= @createdTstamp and T1.DETAIL_TYPE = 'N' and (T1.NON_FIN_OBLG_TYPE in ('HIC', 'ZCS', 'UM')) where exists ( select * from CKT_LEG_ACT_CAS_RL T3 with(readuncommitted) where T2.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T3.LGA_ID and @croIdentifier1 = T3.CRO_IDENTIFIER and @croType1 = T3.CRO_TYPE and @cspNumber1 = T3.CSP_NUMBER and @casNumber1 = T3.CAS_NUMBER ) and exists ( select * from CKT_LEG_ACT_CAS_RL T4 with(readuncommitted) where T2.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T4.LGA_ID and @croIdentifier2 = T4.CRO_IDENTIFIER and @croType2 = T4.CRO_TYPE and @cspNumber2 = T4.CSP_NUMBER and @casNumber2 = T4.CAS_NUMBER ) order by T1.NON_FIN_OBLG_TYPE desc

data.name: ReadLegalActionDetailLegalActionObligationType
data.value: select * from ( select T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.LA_DETAIL_NO, T1.END_DT, T1.EFFECTIVE_DT, T1.CREATED_TSTAMP CREATED_TSTAMP1, T1.NON_FIN_OBLG_TYPE, T1.DETAIL_TYPE, T2.CLASSIFICATION, T2.FILED_DT, T2.STANDARD_NO, T2.CREATED_TSTAMP CREATED_TSTAMP2 from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEGAL_ACT_DTL T1 with(readuncommitted) on T2.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER and (T2.CLASSIFICATION in ('J', 'O')) and T2.FILED_DT > @filedDt and T2.CREATED_TSTAMP <= @createdTstamp and T1.CREATED_TSTAMP <= @createdTstamp and T1.DETAIL_TYPE = 'F' where exists ( select * from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS T3 with(readuncommitted) where T1.LA_DETAIL_NO = T3.LAD_R_NUMBER and T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER = T3.LGA_R_IDENTIFIER and T3.ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'R' and @cspNumber1 = T3.CSP_NUMBER ) and exists ( select * from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS T4 with(readuncommitted) where T1.LA_DETAIL_NO = T4.LAD_R_NUMBER and T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER = T4.LGA_R_IDENTIFIER and T4.ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'S' and @cspNumber2 = T4.CSP_NUMBER ) ) S1 cross apply ( select T1.DEBT_TYP_ID, T1.DEBT_TYP_CD, T1.DEBT_TYP_CLASS, T2.CPA_TYPE, T2.CSP_NUMBER, T2.OB_ID, T2.CREATED_TMST, T2.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T2.LAD_NUMBER from CKT_OB_TYPE T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OBLIGATION T2 with(readuncommitted) on S1.LA_DETAIL_NO = T2.LAD_NUMBER and S1.LGA_IDENTIFIER = T2.LGA_IDENTIFIER and T1.DEBT_TYP_ID = T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID and T2.CREATED_TMST <= @createdTstamp and ( T1.DEBT_TYP_CD in ('CRCH', 'CS', 'MS', 'AJ', 'MJ', 'MC') ) ) S2
